title: Opponent Of Same-Sex Marriage Reacts To Ruling
teaser: Jim Campbell is senior counsel for the Alliance Defending Freedom, a conservative Christian law group.
contentencoded:
The U.S. Supreme Court has ruled to extend the right to marry to same-sex couples in all 50 states. Among those who oppose the ruling is Jim Campbell, senior counsel forÂ the Alliance Defending Freedom. He speaks with Here & Now’s Robin Young.

Guest

  • Jim Campbell, senior counsel for the Alliance Defending Freedom, specializing in litigating cases pertaining to the defense of marriage and religious liberty.
